scripts.compile-frontend: npm run install-frontend && (cd bajafrontendv1 && npm run build)
scripts.update-submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach --recursive git fetch && git submodule foreach git merge origin master
scripts.copy-backend: copyfiles -u 1 bajacorev1/package.json dist && npm run copy-workers
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run update-submodules && npm run compile-backend && npm run compile-frontend && npm run copy-frontend && npm run copy-backend
